text:
League 1
Angers: the relapse of Bahoken
The Angevin striker, St√©phane Bahoken relapsed, this Saturday during the victory of Angers against Strasbourg.
03 Nov 2019, 11:00 by Hugo Deloraine



Bad news for Angers! While returning from three weeks of absence after a hamstring left hamstring injury, striker Stephane Bahoken relapsed this Saturday in Angers' win over Strasbourg (1-0) counting for the 12th day of Ligue 1. However, it was he who scored the only goal of the game in the 26th minute on penalty.




"It's not benign"




Bahoken + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Replaced in the 41st minute, the striker left the stadium on crutches. He explains his injury. "On the control I accelerate and I feel a tip in the same place as the last time" His trainer, St√©phane Moulin, he is worried: "It's not benign". Hoping for him that it is not too serious.
